title: Japan : number of internet users 2017 to 2023
yAxis: Number of internet users in millions
summary: Overall Number of internet users in millions has decreased over the Year.
Number of internet users in millions is slightly decreasing from 2021 to 2023.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2021 and 2022.
Maximum Number of internet users in millions, about 117.9 was reported at Year 2021
The lowest Number of internet users in millions, of value 117.5 was reported at Year 2023
